Package utils

Class MapParser

  • Object
    • utils.MapParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditMap
    public class MapParser
extends Object
    The Map Parser utility parses the whole map file from disk.

      • loadMap

        public static GameMap loadMap​(String fileName)
                       throws IOException,
                              Exception
        Loads the map file and parses it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the location of the map file to be parsed
        Returns:
        GameMap the parsed GameMap Object
        Throws:
        IOException - when file location/contents are invalid
        Exception - when map file doesn't contain all the required sections

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap​(GameMap gameMap,
                    String fileName)
             throws IOException
        Saves the map into a file.
        Parameters:
        gameMap - The GameMap object to save.
        fileName - The name of the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - TODO: will handle this.

      • serializeMap

        public String serializeMap​(GameMap gameMap)
        Serializes a GameMap object into a string (file data).
        Parameters:
        gameMap - The GameMap object to serialize.
        Returns:
        The file as a string.

      • mapCountry

        public static Pair<String,​Country> mapCountry​(String countryLine,
                                                    ArrayList<String> continentNames)
        This maps the country from the file into a Country object.
        Parameters:
        countryLine - the raw line from the file.
        continentNames - the names of all continents
        Returns:
        A Pair object, key is the name and the value is the Country object

      • mapContinent

        public static Pair<String,​Continent> mapContinent​(String continentLine)
        This maps the continent from the file into a Continent object.
        Parameters:
        continentLine - the raw line from the file.
        Returns:
        A Pair object, key is the name and the value is the Continent object

      • mapBorders

        public static Pair<String,​Set<String>> mapBorders​(String borderLine,
                                                        ArrayList<String> countryNames)
        This maps the borders from the file into a Border object.
        Parameters:
        borderLine - the raw line from the file.
        countryNames - A list of country names.
        Returns:
        A Pair object, key is the name and the value is a Set of borders.
